summary: Adds 3 destruction spells and spell tomes to the game.
descriptionHtml:
I always loved the Concentration spells, and hated that there were only novice versions of them. This mod fixes that. There are now 3 Adept level concentration spells, that do damage par with other Adept spells.

Adds 3 spells to the game:
-Superior Flames
-Superior Sparks
-Superior Frostbite

Adds 3 Spell Tomes to the game:
-Spell Tome: Superior Flames
-Spell Tome: Superior Sparks
-Spell Tome: Superior Frostbite

All three spells can be found on a table in the College of Winterhold Arcaneum.

The spells are upgraded variations of the Novice Destruction spells, each doing 25 pts/sec.

*Spells read as Novice in the menus, however they are in fact Adept level spells.
author: OrdinaryOrdinator
